RelatedSentence: We 're very proud to be the first national pharmacy chain to take the important step in support of the health and wellbeing of the customers and patients we serve .
It also puts us in full alignment with the goals of our clients and health care partners , including physicians , hospitals and community organizations .
Fact : Smoking causes 87 percent of all lung cancer deaths and 79 percent of all cases of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) .
